file.name: IssuedDeviceTracking.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: Issued Device Tracking
  description: This service domain handles operational access to issued device tracking services. Services report on the status of devices such as cards, fobs, etc. that have been issued to customers. Service notifications include fraud warnings/alerts and device cancellation.
  version: 10.0.0
servers:
- description: SwaggerHub API Auto Mocking
  url: https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/BIAN-3/IssuedDeviceTracking/10.0.0
paths:
  /IssuedDeviceTracking/Initiate:
    post:
      tags:
      - CR - IssuedDeviceState
      summary: InCR Initiate tracking for an allocated issued device
      description: InCR Initiate tracking for an allocated issued device
      operationId: Initiate
      parameters: []
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/InitiateIssuedDeviceStateRequest'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/IssuedDeviceState'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /IssuedDeviceTracking/{issueddevicetrackingId}/Update:
    put:
      tags:
      - CR - IssuedDeviceState
      summary: UpCR Update details of a tracked issued device
      description: UpCR Update details of a tracked issued device
      operationId: Update
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/IssuedDeviceTrackingID'
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/IssuedDeviceState'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/IssuedDeviceState'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /IssuedDeviceTracking/{issueddevicetrackingId}/Retrieve:
    get:
      tags:
      - CR - IssuedDeviceState
      summary: ReCR Retrieve details about a tracked device
      description: ReCR Retrieve details about a tracked device
      operationId: Retrieve
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/IssuedDeviceTrackingID'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/IssuedDeviceState'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /IssuedDeviceTracking/{issueddevicetrackingId}/InternalNotification/{internalnotificationId}/Update:
    put:
      tags:
      - BQ - InternalNotification
      summary: UpBQ Update captured internal status details for an issued device
      description: UpBQ Update captured internal status details for an issued device
      operationId: UpdateInternalNotification
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/IssuedDeviceTrackingID'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/InternalNotificationID'
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/UpdateInternalNotificationRequest'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/UpdateInternalNotificationResponse'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /IssuedDeviceTracking/{issueddevicetrackingId}/InternalNotification/{internalnotificationId}/Capture:
    put:
      tags:
      - BQ - InternalNotification
      summary: CaBQ Capture status notification for an issued device
      description: CaBQ Capture status notification for an issued device
      operationId: CaptureInternalNotification
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/IssuedDeviceTrackingID'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/InternalNotificationID'
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/CaptureInternalNotificationRequest'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/CaptureInternalNotificationResponse'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /IssuedDeviceTracking/{issueddevicetrackingId}/InternalNotification/{internalnotificationId}/Retrieve:
    get:
      tags:
      - BQ - InternalNotification
      summary: ReBQ Retrieve internal status notification details
      description: ReBQ Retrieve internal status notification details
      operationId: RetrieveInternalNotification
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/IssuedDeviceTrackingID'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/InternalNotificationID'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/RetrieveInternalNotificationResponse'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /IssuedDeviceTracking/{issueddevicetrackingId}/ExternalReport/{externalreportId}/Update:
    put:
      tags:
      - BQ - ExternalReport
      summary: UpBQ Update captured externally reported status details for an issued device
      description: UpBQ Update captured externally reported status details for an issued device
      operationId: UpdateExternalReport
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/IssuedDeviceTrackingID'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/ExternalReportID'
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/UpdateExternalReportRequest'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/UpdateExternalReportResponse'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /IssuedDeviceTracking/{issueddevicetrackingId}/ExternalReport/{externalreportId}/Capture:
    put:
      tags:
      - BQ - ExternalReport
      summary: CaBQ Capture external notification status details for an issued device
      description: CaBQ Capture external notification status details for an issued device
      operationId: CaptureExternalReport
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/IssuedDeviceTrackingID'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/ExternalReportID'
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/CaptureExternalReportRequest'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/CaptureExternalReportResponse'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /IssuedDeviceTracking/{issueddevicetrackingId}/ExternalReport/{externalreportId}/Retrieve:
    get:
      tags:
      - BQ - ExternalReport
      summary: ReBQ Retrieve external status notification details
      description: ReBQ Retrieve external status notification details
      operationId: RetrieveExternalReport
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/IssuedDeviceTrackingID'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/ExternalReportID'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/RetrieveExternalReportResponse'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
components:
  schemas:
    IssuedDeviceState:
      type: object
      properties:
        InformationFeedProviderReference:
          type: object
        IssuedDeviceAllocationInstanceReference:
          type: object
        IssuedDeviceAllocationStatus:
          type: string
    ExternalReport:
      type: object
      properties:
        InformationFeedServiceContentRecord:
          type: string
        IssuedDeviceReference:
          type: object
        IssuedDeviceType:
          type: string
        CustomerReference:
          type: object
        ProductInstanceReference:
          type: object
        StatusUpdateDetails:
          type: string
        StatusUpdateResult:
          type: string
        Date:
          type: string
    InternalNotification:
      type: object
      properties:
        IssuedDeviceReference:
          type: object
        IssuedDeviceType:
          type: string
        CustomerReference:
          type: object
        ProductInstanceReference:
          type: object
        StatusUpdateDetails:
          type: string
        StatusUpdateResult:
          type: string
        Date:
          type: string
    HTTPError:
      type: object
      properties:
        status_code:
          type: string
        status:
          type: string
        message:
          type: string
    InitiateIssuedDeviceStateRequest:
      type: object
      properties:
        IssuedDeviceState:
          type: object
          properties:
            IssuedDeviceAllocationInstanceReference:
              type: object
            IssuedDeviceAllocationStatus:
              type: string
    UpdateInternalNotificationRequest:
      type: object
      properties:
        IssuedDeviceState:
          type: object
          properties:
            InformationFeedProviderReference:
              type: object
            IssuedDeviceAllocationInstanceReference:
              type: object
            IssuedDeviceAllocationStatus:
              type: string
        InternalNotification:
          type: object
          properties:
            IssuedDeviceReference:
              type: object
            IssuedDeviceType:
              type: string
            CustomerReference:
              type: object
            ProductInstanceReference:
              type: object
            StatusUpdateDetails:
              type: string
            StatusUpdateResult:
              type: string
    UpdateInternalNotificationResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        IssuedDeviceState:
          type: object
          properties:
            InformationFeedProviderReference:
              type: object
            IssuedDeviceAllocationInstanceReference:
              type: object
            IssuedDeviceAllocationStatus:
              type: string
        InternalNotification:
          type: object
          properties:
            IssuedDeviceReference:
              type: object
            IssuedDeviceType:
              type: string
            CustomerReference:
              type: object
            ProductInstanceReference:
              type: object
            StatusUpdateDetails:
              type: string
            StatusUpdateResult:
              type: string
    CaptureInternalNotificationRequest:
      type: object
      properties:
        InternalNotification:
          type: object
          properties:
            IssuedDeviceReference:
              type: object
            IssuedDeviceType:
              type: string
            CustomerReference:
              type: object
            ProductInstanceReference:
              type: object
            StatusUpdateDetails:
              type: string
    CaptureInternalNotificationResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        InternalNotification:
          type: object
          properties:
            StatusUpdateResult:
              type: string
    RetrieveInternalNotificationResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        IssuedDeviceState:
          type: object
          properties:
            InformationFeedProviderReference:
              type: object
            IssuedDeviceAllocationInstanceReference:
              type: object
            IssuedDeviceAllocationStatus:
              type: string
        InternalNotification:
          type: object
          properties:
            IssuedDeviceReference:
              type: object
            IssuedDeviceType:
              type: string
            CustomerReference:
              type: object
            ProductInstanceReference:
              type: object
            StatusUpdateDetails:
              type: string
            StatusUpdateResult:
              type: string
    UpdateExternalReportRequest:
      type: object
      properties:
        IssuedDeviceState:
          type: object
          properties:
            InformationFeedProviderReference:
              type: object
            IssuedDeviceAllocationInstanceReference:
              type: object
            IssuedDeviceAllocationStatus:
              type: string
        ExternalReport:
          type: object
          properties:
            InformationFeedServiceContentRecord:
              type: string
            IssuedDeviceReference:
              type: object
            IssuedDeviceType:
              type: string
            CustomerReference:
              type: object
            ProductInstanceReference:
              type: object
            StatusUpdateDetails:
              type: string
            StatusUpdateResult:
              type: string
    UpdateExternalReportResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        IssuedDeviceState:
          type: object
          properties:
            InformationFeedProviderReference:
              type: object
            IssuedDeviceAllocationInstanceReference:
              type: object
            IssuedDeviceAllocationStatus:
              type: string
        ExternalReport:
          type: object
          properties:
            InformationFeedServiceContentRecord:
              type: string
            IssuedDeviceReference:
              type: object
            IssuedDeviceType:
              type: string
            CustomerReference:
              type: object
            ProductInstanceReference:
              type: object
            StatusUpdateDetails:
              type: string
            StatusUpdateResult:
              type: string
    CaptureExternalReportRequest:
      type: object
      properties:
        ExternalReport:
          type: object
          properties:
            InformationFeedServiceContentRecord:
              type: string
            IssuedDeviceReference:
              type: object
            IssuedDeviceType:
              type: string
            CustomerReference:
              type: object
            ProductInstanceReference:
              type: object
            StatusUpdateDetails:
              type: string
    CaptureExternalReportResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        ExternalReport:
          type: object
          properties:
            StatusUpdateResult:
              type: string
    RetrieveExternalReportResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        IssuedDeviceState:
          type: object
          properties:
            InformationFeedProviderReference:
              type: object
            IssuedDeviceAllocationInstanceReference:
              type: object
            IssuedDeviceAllocationStatus:
              type: string
        ExternalReport:
          type: object
          properties:
            InformationFeedServiceContentRecord:
              type: string
            IssuedDeviceReference:
              type: object
            IssuedDeviceType:
              type: string
            CustomerReference:
              type: object
            ProductInstanceReference:
              type: object
            StatusUpdateDetails:
              type: string
            StatusUpdateResult:
              type: string
  parameters:
    IssuedDeviceTrackingID:
      name: issueddevicetrackingId
      in: path
      required: true
      style: simple
      explode: false
      schema:
        type: string
    ExternalReportID:
      name: externalreportId
      in: path
      required: true
      style: simple
      explode: false
      schema:
        type: string
    InternalNotificationID:
      name: internalnotificationId
      in: path
      required: true
      style: simple
      explode: false
      schema:
        type: string
  requestBodies:
    InitiateIssuedDeviceStateRequest:
      required: true
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/InitiateIssuedDeviceStateRequest'
    IssuedDeviceState:
      required: true
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/IssuedDeviceState'
    UpdateInternalNotificationRequest:
      required: true
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/UpdateInternalNotificationRequest'
    CaptureInternalNotificationRequest:
      required: true
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/CaptureInternalNotificationRequest'
    UpdateExternalReportRequest:
      required: true
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/UpdateExternalReportRequest'
    CaptureExternalReportRequest:
      required: true
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/CaptureExternalReportRequest'
  responses:
    HTTPError:
      description: Bad Request
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/HTTPError'
    BadRequestError:
      description: Bad Request
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/HTTPError'
    UnauthorizedError:
      description: Unauthorized
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/HTTPError'
    ForbiddenError:
      description: Forbidden
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/HTTPError'
    NotFoundError:
      description: Not Found
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/HTTPError'
    TooManyRequestsError:
      description: Too Many Requests
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/HTTPError'
    InternalServerError:
      description: Internal Server Error
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/HTTPError'
...
